ygData.subject: Re: O'Keill's Radiation
ygData.msgSnippet: Friend you must target yourself or a companion, never target the monsters, and then cast the spell.  This spell is what is know as a damage shield, any thing
ygData.messageBody:
Friend you must target yourself or a companion, never target the
monsters, and then cast the spell. This spell is what is know as a
damage shield, any thing that attacks you for the short time it is in
effect will take a couple of points of damage each time they strike.

Your friendly neighborhood Wizard ; )

- Malebion -


Teri wrote:

> I'm a little confused as t o the effect of O'Keill's Radiation.
> Wouldsomeone be so kind as to enlighten me to its' proper purpose
> andusage? I'm a level 6 wiz on Fennin Ro. Please say hello if you see
> me about. =) Ximena
